name: The Bingo Room
description:
Bingo, an all-time favorite for hosts to engage their audiences and create an atmosphere of fun and connection. The Bingo Room offers a unique play-along experience using your smartphone as the Bingo Card that you can make your own through tons of customization settings by choosing backgrounds, daubers and lots more.

  • Easy to Join Matches
  • Customize your Experience
  • Channel Events
  • Chat Integration
  • Play Classic Bingo
  • Welcome your Viewers to join in the fun!
  • More Modes to come!
